mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOODS VALUE (NULL, #{makerId}, #{categoryId}, #{goodsCode}, #{goodsName}, #{description}, #{discountId}, #{price}, #{retailPrice}, #{inventory}, #{storageType}, #{capacity}, #{expDate}, #{allergyInfo}, #{originPlace}, #{salesStatus}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select:
SELECT G.GOODS_ID, G.GOODS_NM, G.GOODS_CODE, G.GOODS_DC, G.GOODS_PRICE, D.DSCNT_RATE FROM GOODS G LEFT JOIN DSCNT D ON G.GOODS_DSCNT_ID = D.DSCNT_ID WHERE G.GOODS_SEL_STTUS != 'DISCONTINUANCE'
ORDER BY G.GOODS_PRICE ASC
ORDER BY G.GOODS_PRICE DESC
ORDER BY G.CREAT_DE ASC
ORDER BY G.CREAT_DE DESC
ORDER BY G.CREAT_DE DESC
SELECT * FROM GOODS WHERE MAKR_ID = #{makerId} AND GOODS_SEL_STTUS != 'DISCONTINUANCE' ORDER BY CREAT_DE DESC
SELECT * FROM GOODS WHERE CTGRY_ID = #{categoryId} AND GOODS_SEL_STTUS != 'DISCONTINUANCE' ORDER BY CREAT_DE DESC
SELECT * FROM GOODS WHERE GOODS_ID = #{goodsId} ORDER BY CREAT_DE DESC
SELECT G.GOODS_ID, G.GOODS_NM, G.GOODS_CODE, G.GOODS_DC, G.GOODS_PRICE, D.DSCNT_RATE FROM GOODS G LEFT JOIN DSCNT D ON G.GOODS_DSCNT_ID = D.DSCNT_ID WHERE G.GOODS_ID = #{goodsId}

SELECT G.GOODS_ID, G.GOODS_NM, G.GOODS_CODE, G.GOODS_DC, G.GOODS_PRICE, D.DSCNT_RATE FROM GOODS G LEFT JOIN DSCNT D ON G.GOODS_DSCNT_ID = D.DSCNT_ID WHERE (G.CTGRY_ID = #{categoryId} OR G.CTGRY_ID IN (SELECT C.CTGRY_ID FROM CTGRY C WHERE C.CTGRY_UPPER = #{categoryId} AND C.CTGRY_UPPER IS NOT NULL)) AND G.GOODS_SEL_STTUS != 'DISCONTINUANCE'
ORDER BY G.GOODS_PRICE ASC
ORDER BY G.GOODS_PRICE DESC
ORDER BY G.CREAT_DE ASC
ORDER BY G.CREAT_DE DESC
ORDER BY G.CREAT_DE DESC

SELECT G.GOODS_ID as goodsId, G.GOODS_NM as goodsName, G.GOODS_CODE as goodsCode, G.GOODS_PRICE as price, G.GOODS_INVTRY as inventory, G.GOODS_CSTDY_TY as storageType, G.GOODS_SEL_STTUS as salesStatus, D.DSCNT_RATE as discountRate FROM GOODS G LEFT JOIN DSCNT D ON G.GOODS_DSCNT_ID = D.DSCNT_ID WHERE G.GOODS_ID = #{goodsId} AND G.GOODS_SEL_STTUS != 'DISCONTINUANCE' ORDER BY G.CREAT_DE DESC

SELECT G.GOODS_ID, G.GOODS_CODE, G.GOODS_NM, G.GOODS_DC, G.GOODS_PRICE, G.GOODS_INVTRY, G.GOODS_CSTDY_TY, G.GOODS_CPCY, G.GOODS_EXPR_DE, G.GOODS_ALLERGY_INFO, G.GOODS_ORGPLCE, G.GOODS_SEL_STTUS, D.DSCNT_RATE, M.MAKR_NM FROM GOODS G LEFT JOIN DSCNT D ON G.GOODS_DSCNT_ID = D.DSCNT_ID LEFT JOIN MAKR M ON G.MAKR_ID = M.MAKR_ID WHERE G.GOODS_ID = #{goodsId} AND G.GOODS_SEL_STTUS != 'DISCONTINUANCE'

SELECT G.GOODS_ID, G.GOODS_CODE, G.GOODS_NM, G.GOODS_DC, G.GOODS_PRICE, G.GOODS_INVTRY, G.GOODS_CSTDY_TY, G.GOODS_CPCY, G.GOODS_EXPR_DE, G.GOODS_ALLERGY_INFO, G.GOODS_ORGPLCE, G.GOODS_SEL_STTUS, D.DSCNT_RATE, M.MAKR_NM FROM GOODS G LEFT JOIN DSCNT D ON G.GOODS_DSCNT_ID = D.DSCNT_ID LEFT JOIN MAKR M ON G.MAKR_ID = M.MAKR_ID WHERE G.GOODS_CODE = #{goodsCode} AND G.GOODS_SEL_STTUS != 'DISCONTINUANCE'

SELECT G.GOODS_ID, G.GOODS_NM, G.GOODS_CODE, G.GOODS_DC, G.GOODS_PRICE, D.DSCNT_RATE FROM GOODS G LEFT JOIN DSCNT D ON G.GOODS_DSCNT_ID = D.DSCNT_ID WHERE G.GOODS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{goodsName}, '%') AND G.GOODS_SEL_STTUS != 'DISCONTINUANCE'
ORDER BY G.GOODS_PRICE ASC
ORDER BY G.GOODS_PRICE DESC
ORDER BY G.CREAT_DE ASC
ORDER BY G.CREAT_DE DESC
ORDER BY G.CREAT_DE DESC
SELECT G.GOODS_ID, G.GOODS_NM, G.GOODS_CODE, G.GOODS_DC, G.GOODS_PRICE, D.DSCNT_RATE FROM GOODS G LEFT JOIN DSCNT D ON G.GOODS_DSCNT_ID = D.DSCNT_ID ORDER BY G.CREAT_DE DESC LIMIT 12
SELECT G.GOODS_ID, G.GOODS_NM, G.GOODS_CODE, G.GOODS_DC, G.GOODS_PRICE, D.DSCNT_RATE FROM GOODS G LEFT JOIN DSCNT D ON G.GOODS_DSCNT_ID = D.DSCNT_ID ORDER BY D.DSCNT_RATE DESC LIMIT 12
